meanings.sent1: The foveolate surface of the moon was fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a foveolate texture on the sculpture to add depth.
meanings.sent3: The foveolate pattern on the cake made it look like a miniature lunar landscape.
meanings.sent4: Her skin, foveolate from acne scars, resembled a map of constellations.
meanings.sent5: The foveolate appearance of the rock formation was etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: Covered with small pits or depressions
meanings.sent1: The ancient wall was foveolate with age and weathering.
meanings.sent2: The path was foveolate with small pebbles that made walking difficult.
meanings.sent3: The foveolate texture of the bread crust made it look like a tiny mountain range.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt foveolate, filled with small emotional craters.
meanings.sent5: The foveolate terrain of the desert was both beautiful and treacherous.
